reporting_cycle: The Director General of the IAEA to provide regular updates to the IAEA Board of Governors and, as appropriate, in parallel to the Security Council on Iranâ€™s implementation of its commitments under the JCPOA every six months
summary:
Attachment 1 lists persons, entities, and bodies subject to sanctions, including:
- Financial institutions: Arian Bank, Bank Kargoshae, Bank Melli Iran, Bank of Industry and Mine, Bank Refah Kargaran, and Bank Tejarat.
- Shipping companies: Acena Shipping Company Limited, Alpha Effort Ltd, Alpha Kara Navigation Limited, and Azores Shipping Company.
- Industrial companies: Aghajari Oil & Gas Production Company, Arvand Oil & Gas Company, Azarab Industries, and Cement Investment and Development Company.
- Individuals: Reza Aghazadeh, Mohammad Ahmadian, Massoud Akhavan-Fard, and Naser Bateni.
This document appears to be a list of entities, likely related to sanctions or other regulatory actions, as indicated by the reference to 2231 (2015), which is a UN Security Council Resolution. The list includes:
